name: run-step-list
title: List Run Steps
description: Retrieve all steps in a run execution with pagination support. Use this to understand how an assistant processed a run, debug issues, or analyze assistant behavior. Each step shows what the assistant did during the run, including tool calls and message creation.

thread_id.description: The unique identifier of the thread containing the run (format: "thread_abc123...").

run_id.description: The unique identifier of the run to list steps from (format: "run_abc123...").

limit.description: Maximum number of steps to return in one request (1-100, default: 20).

order.description: Sort order by creation date: "desc" for newest first (default), "asc" for oldest first (chronological order).

after.description: Pagination cursor - step ID to start listing after (format: "step_abc123...").

before.description: Pagination cursor - step ID to end listing before (format: "step_abc123...").

examples.title: Debug run execution
examples.description: View all steps to understand how the assistant processed the run
